question: Which therapies target TOP1 and also have biomarker evidence in Colon Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which therapies target TOP1 and also have biomarker evidence in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neuroblastoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which therapies target ALK and also have biomarker evidence in Pancreatic Acinar Cell Adenocarcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acinar' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which therapies target ALK and also have biomarker evidence in Malignant Lip Melanoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'skin' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastrointestinal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'system'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List therapies that target ALK with evidence in Malignant Melanoma.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'sarcomatoid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'sarcoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which therapies target ALK and also have biomarker evidence in Lung Large Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND

question: Which therapies target ALK and also have biomarker evidence in Nonsmall Cell Adenocarcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What drugs targeting ALK have biomarker evidence in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'desmoplastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'infantile' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ganglioglioma' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS '/' AND

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN

  t.name AS therapy_name,

LIMIT 100

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ganglioneuroblastoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What drugs targeting ALK have biomarker evidence in Lipofibromatosis-like Neural Tumor?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lipofibromatosis-like' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neural' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'high' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'grade' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'glioma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List therapies that target AKT1 with evidence in Bone Tissue Neoplasm.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('AKT1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'osteosarcoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stomach'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('AKT1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'clear' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'renal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What drugs targeting AKT1 have biomarker evidence in Carcinoma Of Pancreas?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('AKT1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN

  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Show treatments hitting AKT2 that have biomarker evidence in Mammary Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('AKT2')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT2'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stomach'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Show treatments hitting AKT2 that have biomarker evidence in Clear Cell Kidney Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('AKT2')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT2'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'clear' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'renal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN

  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (

OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)

WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('AKT3')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT3'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,

  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT3'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('AKT3')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AKT3'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'serous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cystadenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALOX5')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALOX5'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'clear' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'renal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('FGFR1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('FGFR1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'bladder' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which therapies target FGFR1 and also have biomarker evidence in Neuroendocrine Neoplasm?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids

cypher:

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Show treatments hitting FGFR1 that have biomarker evidence in Carcinoma Of The Adrenal Gland.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('FGFR1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adrenal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('FGFR1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which therapies target FGFR1 and also have biomarker evidence in Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('FGFR1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What drugs targeting FGFR1 have biomarker evidence in Transitional Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('FGFR1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'transitional' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
